triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: The paper investigates consensus control for nonlinear multi-agent systems with parameter uncertainties.

triples.name: Fuzzy logic
triples.relevance: Interval type-2 fuzzy systems are used to model the multi-agent systems in the paper.

triples.name: Consensus (computer science)
triples.relevance: Achieving consensus among agents is the primary control objective of the paper.

triples.name: Lyapunov stability
triples.relevance: A Lyapunov-Krasovskii functional is constructed to establish sufficient conditions for control.

triples.name: Exponential stability
triples.relevance: The paper guarantees exponential consensus of all agents in the multi-agent system.

triples.name: Control theory
triples.relevance: The paper designs and analyzes a dynamic event-triggered fuzzy controller for system consensus.

triples.name: Event-driven programming
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel dynamic event-triggered mechanism for controlling consensus.
